import React from "react"; import './anime-header.css' const AnimeHeader = () => { return (

) } const searchClick = (event) => { const form = (event.nativeEvent.path[1]) const nav = document.querySelector('nav'); console.log(window.getComputedStyle(form).getPropertyValue("height")) console.log(window.getComputedStyle(form).getPropertyValue("width")) console.log(window.getComputedStyle(nav).getPropertyValue("padding-right")) document.querySelector('.lay').style.visibility = "visible" document.querySelector('.searchList').style.width = window.getComputedStyle(form).getPropertyValue("width") document.querySelector('.searchList').style.top = window.getComputedStyle(form).getPropertyValue("height") document.querySelector('.searchList').style.right = window.getComputedStyle(nav).getPropertyValue("padding-right") } export default AnimeHeader;
